title: Honoring Ruben Reyes upon the occasion of his retirement as Facility Director of Allen Residential Center and Youth Leadership Academy
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Ruben  Reyes upon the occasion of his
retirement after more than 30 years of distinguished service as Facility
Director of Allen Residential Center and Youth Leadership Academy,  both
in South Kortright, New York

WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body seeks to acknowledge those individuals
whose professional lives and civic endeavors serve to enhance the  stat-
ure of the State of New York; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Ruben Reyes upon the occasion of his retirement after more than 30 years
of  distinguished  service  as  Facility  Director  of Allen Residential
Center and Youth Leadership Academy, both in South Kortright, New  York;
he officially retired on Thursday, January 6, 2011; and
  WHEREAS,  For  the  past three decades, Ruben Reyes rendered faithful,
conscientious and valuable service to the Allen Residential  Center  and
Youth  Leadership  Academy  as  their Facility Director; recognized as a
visionary, friend and leader, he has served in this capacity for  numer-
ous facilities, advocating for his staff as well as the residents; and
  WHEREAS, In his capacity as Facility Director, Ruben Reyes served with
loyalty, honor and distinction, and was governed by a keen sense of duty
and always showed a unique grasp of human problems; and
  WHEREAS, Giving his time and energy to countless hours of volunteering
and  community service, Ruben Reyes has also pioneered the way for juve-
nile justice; and
  WHEREAS, With a strong belief in  the  community,  Ruben  Reyes  is  a
member  of  the American Correctional Association, the Tri-Town Boys and
Girls Club, and the Boy Scouts of America; he is also  a  congregant  of
Sacred  Heart  Church  in  Sidney, New York, and a past volunteer of the
Sidney Fire Department; and
  WHEREAS, With him throughout have been his wife, Jayne, and their  two
children,  Nicholas  and Diana, all of whom feel privileged to be a part
of his life and rejoice in his achievements; and
  WHEREAS, It is the custom of this  Legislative  Body  that  those  who
enhance the quality of life in their community and have shown a long and
sustained  commitment  to  the  maintenance  of  high standards in their
profession, certainly have earned the recognition and  applause  of  all
the citizens of this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Ruben Reyes upon the occasion of his retirement after more than 30
years of distinguished service as Facility Director of Allen Residential
Center and Youth Leadership Academy, and best wishes to him in  all  his
future endeavors; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Ruben Reyes, 17 Winegard Street, Sidney, New York 13838.
